recommendations: Daria Ruzaykina “Sushma is a passionate, future-ready, and effective product manager. I mentored and worked with Sushma for Zara.com and she was always a great support to our team. She has a strong fashion sense and an open mind to all aspects of working on a multi-functional team.”

Ajay Karwasra “Sushma is a self-motivated, forward thinker and a deal cracker. With her people management skills, she manages to complete the assigned task by her manager within timelines in the most effective manner. She is Skilled in Brand Building, E-commerce, Business Growth, Trend Analysis, Sales, Retail and Business Development. She is a true asset for any organization. ”
